CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBeginPlay
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
self:Hide() local ShowUI = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/최종점수UI") ShowUI:SetEnable(true) wait(2) ShowUI:SetEnable(false)
local ShowUI2 = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/룰렛UI") ShowUI2:SetEnable(true)

CodeBlockMethod.Name: Hide
CodeBlockMethod.Code: local HideUI = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/윷놀이맵 UI") HideUI.Enable = false log(HideUI.Enable )
